name: Mirror Room
description: Room with wall-to-wall mirrors, ideal for dance classes.

name: Rhythm Studio
description: Cozy studio with good acoustics for rhythm and individual classes.

name: Acrobatics Room
description: Spacious room equipped with mats and acrobatics equipment.

name: Modern Room
description: Room with modern sound system and LED lighting.

name: Improvisation Studio
description: Intimate space for improvisation classes and individual work.

name: Group Room A
description: Large room for organized groups, equipped with a projector.

name: Group Room B
description: Twin room to Group Room A, adapted for large dance classes.
